cause.description:
**In summary, for a $100 donation, $95.50 goes to the nonprofit, $3 goes to Justgive.org, and $1.50 goes to Project Agape.**
CIS is the nation's leading community-based dropout prevention network. Communities In Schools of San Antonio celebrates two decades of helping kids stay in school and prepare for life. CIS helps students stay in school and make the right choices by connecting schools with needed community resources. By bringing services, community agencies, parents, and volunteers into schools, we create a community of caring adults who work hand in hand with educators. The result: Teachers are free to teach and students can concentrate on learning.
Through a holistic, one-on-one case management approach, CIS-SA is able to reach out to students most at-risk for dropping out of school. CIS-SA has helped kids to help themselves since 1985.
1. Financially contribute to assist CIS-SA in mentoring San Antonio students
2. Volunteer to mentor students in San Antonio
cause.mission: Assist CIS-SA in the education of students requesting mentoring
